txt.en: Léothred can be found at Hlithseld.\n\nYou should talk to Léothred at Hlithseld.
A letter has arrived from Léothred, the Rohirric historian.

Agátur hands you a letter.

'Léothred wanted me to give this to you when I saw you next.'

The letter is brief:

'[placeholder], I am still in Misthallow and wish to talk with you, as soon as you are able.

'Léothred.'
